sections.summary:
Accomplished sales professional with 20 years of business development and account management experience in both the private and public sector;
healthcare, education and government. Adept at managing intense demands of multiple existing customer accounts and cultivates strong customer
relationships.
Highlights
NegotiationÂ Strategic account development
Financial Analysis Relationship selling
Detail OrientedÂ Teamwork
Accomplishments
Selected to the Staples NAC Green Team.
Successfully grew account base to 14 new customers.
Generated $3.5 million in new business acquisition.
Recipient of BDE All Star award.
Closed $700,000 in furniture for customer's new corporate headquarters.
